form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve dependency and indemnity compensation for survivors of certain totally disabled veterans.

section.header: Automatic enrollment for dependency and indemnity compensation for survivors of certain totally disabled veterans

subsection.text: Section 1318(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking The Secretary and inserting (1) The Secretary; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

In carrying out paragraph (1), the Secretary shall treat a notification of the death of a veteran described in subsection (b) as a claim by the surviving spouse and children of the deceased veteran for benefits under this chapter. The Secretary may not require that such spouse and children file a claim for such benefits.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply with respect to deaths of veterans occurring on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
